job description:
Job Description
This Fortune 500 company is seeking an experienced Commercial and Industrial Fuel Sales Executive! This position offers a salary, strong benefits, flexibility, and a strong commission structure!

Position: Data Scientist, senior person (5-8 years of experience in this field).

Need: The key here is someone with machine learning and AI experience. They're doing a lot of machine learning work there. I would even search the term "machine learning".

Job Description:

Key Areas of Responsibility

Works on diverse data sets (transactional, external, CRM, structured, semi-structured, etc.) to develop machine learning models that can be used to generate revenue management insights and recommendations.

Performs statistical analyses on data sets to determine trends and develop business understanding of commercial activity. Work with Amazon Web Services Machine Learning Stack and additional tools for machine learning to drive process improvement and efficiencies.

Works with operations, sales and supply teams to help shape business objectives and prioritization using a methodical, data-driven approach to decision making.

Assists in resolving ambiguous issues and find the insights that drive operational, support and product excellence.

Understanding of the concepts and values of Advanced Analytics, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence, turning data into insight and direction.

May be involved in the Areas of Pricing Strategy, Credit Risk and Exposure Management, Inventory management, customer satisfaction, Purchasing strategy, Unit Margin Management, asset optimization and other corporate and operational areas.

Presents findings in written and verbal format to business leadership.

Builds and maintain positive on-going cooperative relationships with internal stakeholders

Provides support to the rest of the team and to Champions in the Business

Gathers, communicates and manages issues and risks

Architects, builds and manages secure and efficient solutions in with appropriate data management discipline, aligning to any corporate or external standards that are communicated as guidance

Drive continuous improvement through measurement and monitoring

Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree with an emphasis on quantitative or technical work (Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics).

At least 4 -6 years’ in the role of Data Scientist with hands-on experience in full lifecycle development of real-world corporate applications using machine learning models and pipelines.

4 years minimum experience in data management, data transformation and reporting/visualization.

3+ years experience working with RDBMs and SQL.

Proficiency in one or more programming languages (excellent knowledge of Python is required).

Deep knowledge of machine learning algorithms and libraries/frameworks.

Ability to prioritize multiple conflicting priorities while driving towards pragmatic decisions/actions

Deploying machine learning models in distributed / cloud computing.

Designing high performance, resilient implementations

Preferred Qualifications

Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Statistics or related fields.

Strong oral and written communication skills, including the ability to communicate complex findings in a structured and clear manner to a non-technical audience.

Knowledge of one or more visualization tools such as Tableau. Experience gathering reporting and analytics requirements from stakeholders, deriving business insights, and evaluating the impact of business decisions.

Experience working in an Agile environment.
